alert.note: Alert for Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:54PM EDT until July 30 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Turner County in south central Georgia... North central Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 454 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Arabi to near Pitts, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ashburn, Worth, Sycamore, Warwick, Rebecca, Amboy, Hobby, Turner Co Airport, Dakota and Sibley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
